name: Sun City: The first adventure
description:
Sun City: The first adventure is Turn-based adventure game with simple RPJ elements, it will tell you the story of Sun City , And it's fate which you can change it

This game was made for inkjam 2021 in less than 3 days  

credits : 
project manager : Diaa mohamed 
programmer : Abrilys Reyes
